name: Jia Li
routine: Jia Li typically sleeps at 11:30 pm and wakes at 6:30 am to practice tai chi.
occupation: She manages a traditional Chinese medicine clinic and works from 8 am to 6 pm.
thoughts: Lately, she's been pondering about ways to integrate technology into her practice to reach more people, especially after reading a relevant article on February 1st, 2024.
lifestyle: Jia Li enjoys a balance of yin and yang in her diet, practices meditation, and always brews herself a pot of oolong tea while working.

name: Thomas Reed
routine: Thomas usually goes to bed by 9:30 pm and wakes up at 4:45 am for his cycling training.
occupation: Thomas Reed is a professional cyclist with rigorous training schedules that often take him away from home.
thoughts: Thomas was looking forward to an upcoming racing event and spent much of February 2, 2024, strategizing with his coach.
lifestyle: Thomas adheres to a strict training regimen, often undergoing physiotherapy, and has a preference for high-protein meals.
